title: Love is a planned family
creator_credit: Oxford Films (U.S.), Richard Tyson and Richard Tyson, MD
brief_description: Documents the viewpoints of several individuals on family planning and methods of birth control, revealing that they are motivated by love - by a very deep concern for their families, including members yet unborn. Interwoven with the why of family planning is a discussion of the effectiveness of birth control methods. The pill, spermicidal foam, IUD, rhythm, diaphragm and condom are among those covered.
